snippet.title: Ring Flight | Dragontwin
snippet.description:
This is a simple gameplay activity I decided to quickly add to spice up the first EA build (more on that here: https://www.dragontwin.com/earlyaccess ). 
It's still WIP (especially the ring sound definitely needs more variation) but mostly done, I will place a few of these with varying difficulty levels in the landscape!

The music in this video is from two previous tracks mashed together. In the final version the ring flight activity will have its own music in a similar playful vibe as the first part of the video, made by the composer for the game. Check him out here: https://bio.link/jakubpietras
